documents.document: @ArianeBeeston Your article about the Nude Night at the AGNSW was wonderful. It sounded like a remarkable experience.
First of the #pinp17 season. @SeandBlogonaut @JodiCleghorn @angsavage https://t.co/VFT8ZTYDsS
@SeandBlogonaut @angsavage I'll show you my dishpan hands! ;)
@SeandBlogonaut @angsavage That's true. But domestic chores take priority. At it very soon.
@SeandBlogonaut And it's a cool poem.
@SeandBlogonaut Love the characters at the end.
A quiet and reflective moment in our school chapel after novena. https://t.co/oZIKMnUxiL
@SeandBlogonaut @angsavage It is very cool. Better get onto mine.
Funny seeing all the new senior boys in their new shirts still with the crease marks from being in the box.
TFW when you see students on the playground you taught last year but for the life of you CANNOT remember their name.
Random Poll: Shower first thing in the morning or last thing before going to bed? I am of the former preference.
@nsmithonline *adjusts cardigan* Browse the ads. All you need to know is there. Kids will fill in the rest #olderiswhack
@nsmithonline But how will you be "with it" and hip with the kids if you can't riff on the reality tv du jour? :)
@bobbyllew You're a natural then. It's been brutally hot lately, and forecast for more of the same. Even we're a bit done with the heat.
@bobbyllew Beautiful place to be. Sorry about the torturous heat of late. Hope you have a lovely time around my home town.
@SeandBlogonaut @JodiCleghorn @JaxOfBo Post It Notes and pens on standby.
@charlesdavis75 Gorgeous photo.
Kids these days not having to know how to rule a margin. All their exercise books come pre-ruled. Not like in our day!
@aussiemoose Good policy. And yes, the world is still sadly screwed but we need to keep propping up the sky with goodness.
@charlesdavis75 Yep, looks like my girls. One of mine has taken to climbing the walls to reach the roof, like you would do between doorframe
I'm wearing pants. Professional courtesy.
It's the first day of Year 7 at my school today *grabs mic* TIME TO OPEN THIS PIT UP! CIRCLE WORK!
@GlbrtPtts1 I'm feeling sorry for my students who are back this week. So damn hot means learning hardly gets a look in when you're fried.
Trying to avoid the sun today, in fact this week, in Sydney lest I end up looking like this and exploding in littleâ€¦ https://t.co/RLur5tNPyk
Excuse me while I take my frypan outside to cook dinner. Please hand me that raw egg and rashers of bacon.
Time to change a few things then. https://t.co/KPzPhnOWcl
Students, we are going to learn about irony. Please open your iPad and follow the link to the article, "Managing Screen Time for Teens."
@EduTweetOz Except if the tennis goes late and we all regret our choices in staying up to watch "just one more game then I'll go to bed."
@BenLeighHobson Do your students know you write/are about to be published or is that Your Secret Identity? *swirls cape*
@BenLeighHobson Colds suck. Heading back with forecast temps of 40+ Thinking of buying huge supply of Zooper Doopers for after lunch.
@BenLeighHobson You've been back to the classroom already? I head back in tomorrow.
@BenLeighHobson Back when action films had meaning and purpose and the hero actually got hurt.
@BenLeighHobson And I was given a lovely fountain pen for my 40th by my faculty a couple of years back. Very nice.
@BenLeighHobson I've used the same type of pen, the Artline 0.4 Felt Tip since high school. Now branched into using the 0.2 and a Lamy
@BenLeighHobson The Rock is good. Pearl Harbour is a monstrosity. Transformers needs to take a long hard look for a plot.
@GlbrtPtts1 I'll have to break out the permanent marker and write it in the font style of AC/DC.
There's something very satisfying about having new pens for the new year. Makes me want to write, but not write because it's a new pen.
@BenLeighHobson Have you been indoctrinated into the Michael Bay School of Filmmaking and Thought? Please tell me you haven't.
@GlbrtPtts1 In reality I've been getting ready for the new school year by organising my school bag and pencil case #littlethingsFTW
@GlbrtPtts1 Sounds like you have something in common with The Orange Headed One.
You know what's cool about the start of the school year? New stationery!
Follow this thread re: art and resistance. https://t.co/5vYPW1TCDh
Anyone else summoning the rain gods by washing their cars?
Had the strangest dream: was on my way to play a gig and for the life of me I could not find the venue. Kept searching to no avail #stress
@Amelia_Draws Didn't have them for my girls. Nor did we find out gender. Both were surprises. Nor did we reveal names.
@melludee HAPPY NEW YEAR OF THE ROOSTER TO YOU!
Follow this thread for a minute. Worth your time. https://t.co/DT40NoRSiz
@BenLeighHobson Why not both?! :)
@BenLeighHobson Is that for a weekend of reading and no interruptions or appearing in someone's TBR pile or both? :)
@aussiemoose I'd rather be teaching than sitting through administrivia.
@aussiemoose Yep, I'm back to school on Monday. Student free day. Hence day of relatively completely useless meetings.
Think I'd better back up my laptop before school resumes on Monday as I suspect it will crap itself when it tries to reconnect to the system
@GlbrtPtts1 Man, you're raking in the legit followers now!
@GlbrtPtts1 That's bot-tastic!
@aussiemoose Because you're inhabiting the Twilight Zone between a public holiday and the weekend.
Today's the day I'd better break in my new school shoes. Blister alert. Band Aids on standby.
Brain wants to edit but body says, "Nope, ewe wood knot know what yew were righting." #tootired
And who needs to watch MKR because they've set up the personalities and stereotypes and shown all the good bits.
Not one for betting but what's the bet the personalities on "I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out of Here" will be stereotypically cliched as Oz TV?
I know the "new and improved" Pizza Shapes still taste like stale disappointment but because the box is there & open I'm still eating them.
@jazir1979 Just don't read the last 20 pages :)
@aussiemoose Fairy bread AND lamgintons combined into one delicious diabetic coma!
@aussiemoose How did they taste?
@MsBessieBell No pressure then ðŸ˜‰
@MsBessieBell The vignette is written but not edited. And a testament to writing dangerously I think.
@MsBessieBell I'll start Orange Peel when home (only brought what I needed on hols) and finish the vignette I started.
@MsBessieBell As writer I love the playing with lang/image/emotion but I want the reader to be sucked in to the story.
@MsBessieBell characters to make them really engage & it's showing in the depth of writing & how we are writing. Stepping out to go deeper.
@MsBessieBell Stories are meant to be ugly (however we want to define/use it). In a collab novel w/ 2 others, we're pushing in deep to our
@MsBessieBell Now read Muted and She. Very powerful. Inspires me to write more dangerously, with greater conviction, with renewed passion.
@MsBessieBell Holidays are great times for reading. The covers are brilliant. Enjoying this book. https://t.co/hm5SMyTFv3
I predict English teachers will be required in the future to correct these monstrosities. https://t.co/QAMlimCt4I
@21stCscribe Yeah, it's the bubble we create around ourselves.
@21stCscribe True. But maybe it's a start.
@DarkMatterzine We're stuck in a bind where DV should be jailed but needing more resources to assist all involved, esp victim.
@RevHappiness It is right to protest issues that are problematic but it needs dialogue from a wider representation than simply soapboxers.
@RevHappiness "Throw them in jail" is knee-jerk, emotive, not thought out. It's simplistic w/out considering the wider implications.
@RevHappiness Throwing people in jail w/out adequate resources does nothing to solve the wider issues. Overcrowded prisons don't help.
@TheresaMilstein That is a gorgeous collection. Loved reading it.
@RevHappiness Yet I have not yet seen the media go to the Law Society/judges for their POV. Everyone has an opinion yet no one listens.
@RevHappiness In the wake of Melbourne incident the media goes to its regular mouthpieces about how bail laws have failed/lock them up etc
Soapboxing will be a 2020 Olympic Demonstration Sport so all the shock jocks and celebrity commentators can feel good about themselves.
A juvenile version of the almighty Sarlacc. https://t.co/2hZIVGrlZw
Game ON! https://t.co/xDHEfnhDan
@kirbykirbybee That is pretty spectacular!
@charlesdavis75 Love the silly family photo. All the goodness contained therein.
New ep of Red Dwarf delightfully funny. Some great one liners. And the banter is still spot on. But I missed Season 10. Need to borrow eps.
When asked, "How are you?" my answer might be, "Well, life is a complicated crapstorm & I'm having difficulty keeping my umbrella up. You?"
There should be a rule for tennis players to NOT WEAR THE SAME OUTFIT AT THE SAME TIME. Differentiate, people, so I know who I'm watching.
Solar system or fairy lights in the garden? https://t.co/3OO7lMEmVV
@aussiemoose Which is all a way of motivating me to get my writing finish and subbed out there.
@aussiemoose Maybe before the launch of Who's Afraid 3 :)
@aussiemoose Admittedly my daughters are not in their teens but it's important to support authors when we can, and show books are COOL!
@aussiemoose My daughters were seeing Jacqueline Harvey for the release of the new Alice-Miranda. It's their 3rd launch they've been to.
@JacquelineHarve My Miss #2 wanted to ask you if there would be a book launch for Clementine-Rose in the future?
Under the trees for the new Alice-Miranda book launch with @JacquelineHarve. Beautiful spot #supportlocalauthors https://t.co/REZ9gzN6Yr
@aussiemoose So full of kulcha!
@aussiemoose That's cool. Bummed I couldn't make it last night or I would have said hi. Have taken my girls to a diff book launch thus arvo.
At the launch of @JacquelineHarve's new Alice-Miranda book for my girls. Fabulous storyteller.
@smperris I played tennis when younger but switched to squash through high school. I'm rubbish on a court with no walls.
